headline.0: Iran: What a Difference a Few Months Make

short_description.0: Iran is now facing serious challenges that strike at its economic and military weaknesses. In an Arab world that is less than 10-percent Shiite and distrusts non-Arabs, Persian Shiite Iran faces hostile Arab Sunni fundamentalist movements that are rising in the aftermath of the failures of the Arab Spring.

authors.0: Jonathan Adelman, ContributorProfessor, Josef Korbel School of International Studies, Unive...
